name: Steamer Honey Garlic Chicken
preparation: Chop peppers and chicken into 1" pieces.
Add chicken to Round Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 4 min. Add broccoli, microwave 1 min. Add peppers. Microwave 1–2 min or until chicken is cooked through and veggies are tender-crisp.
Remove chicken and veggies from steamer and discard any liquid; cover to keep warm.

In same steamer (don’t wash) whisk together seasoning, water, and honey. Microwave, uncovered, on high 2 min, whisking halfway through. If not thickened enough to your liking after 2 min, cook for additional 30 sec intervals, whisking after each, until desired thickness is achieved.
Add chicken and veggies to sauce; stir to coat. Spoon into bowls and top each serving with green onion, if desired.
tips: For extra flavour, instead of discarding the cooking liquid from the chicken and veggies, use it to make the sauce! Top up with water until you get 3⁄4 cup.

products.name: Honey Garlic Meatball Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Who doesn't love a saucy meatball!? This protein-packed, family-friendly meal comes together in just 15 minutes with simple pantry ingredients.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
